title: The Pet Rats
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 33 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR30L
description: What kind of animal would make a good class pet? In The Pet Rats, students will learn about all the things these creatures can do. The colorful, detailed illustrations provide information and support for students as they learn about these interesting rodents. Use this book to teach students how to identify the main idea and locate supporting details as well as to locate verbs.
reviewWords: chew, class, climb, drink, hide, sleep
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word run
